name: Parco degli Acquedotti
shortDescription: A vast on-leash park with ancient Roman aqueducts, perfect for a historic stroll with your dog.
fullDescription: Parco degli Acquedotti offers an incredible setting for a walk, with the majestic ruins of ancient Roman aqueducts providing a unique backdrop. The park is vast and mostly flat, with wide grassy fields and unpaved paths. It is a strictly on-leash park to protect the sensitive historical site. There are few amenities, so bringing your own water for your dog is essential, especially on hot summer days. The park is a popular spot for locals, but its size allows for plenty of space to find a quiet corner. Best times to visit are early morning or late afternoon to avoid the midday sun.
rules: Dogs must be on a leash at all times. Owners must clean up waste. Do not climb on or damage the ruins.

name: Il Bar del Cane
shortDescription: A cozy cafe with a small, welcoming terrace where dogs are treated with affection.
fullDescription: Il Bar del Cane is a small, local cafe with a big heart for dogs. The owner is a dog lover who provides fresh water bowls and homemade dog biscuits. The cafe has a small sidewalk terrace with a few tables where dogs can relax. The atmosphere is quiet and friendly, making it a great spot for a relaxed coffee break. It's an excellent place for a quick rest during a walk in the neighborhood. They also offer a variety of delicious pastries and sandwiches.
rules: Dogs must be on a leash. Please be mindful of the limited space on the terrace. Do not feed your dog from the human menu.

name: Parco di Villa Doria Pamphilj
shortDescription: A massive, beautiful park with an extensive trail system for on-leash dog walks.
fullDescription: Parco di Villa Doria Pamphilj is Rome's largest landscaped public park and a favorite for dog owners. The park has a mix of paved and unpaved trails, rolling hills, and vast grassy lawns. While most of the park is on-leash, there are a few designated off-leash areas. The park offers plenty of shade and a number of fountains where you can find water. It's a fantastic place for a long, scenic walk or a jog with your dog. It can get busy on weekends, so early mornings are more peaceful.
rules: Dogs must be leashed in all non-designated off-leash zones. Owners must clean up waste. Respect other visitors and wildlife.

name: Fido's Tavola Calda
shortDescription: A traditional Roman restaurant with a dog-friendly outdoor area, serving classic Italian fare.
fullDescription: Fido's Tavola Calda is a casual eatery with a welcoming atmosphere for dogs and their owners. The restaurant has a spacious outdoor seating area that is perfect for dining with your dog. The staff are friendly and accommodating, and will provide a water bowl upon request. The menu features classic Roman dishes. It's a great spot for a relaxed lunch or dinner after a walk through the city. The terrace is partially covered, offering some relief from the sun or light rain.
rules: Dogs must be on a leash and remain under the table. Do not allow your dog on the furniture. Excessive barking is not permitted.

name: Il Mastino
shortDescription: A small brewery with a dog-friendly courtyard, serving unique craft beers.
fullDescription: Il Mastino is a great place to unwind with a good beer and your dog. Their cozy courtyard is dog-friendly and a perfect spot for your pup to relax. The brewery offers a rotating selection of creative craft beers. The staff are friendly and welcoming to dogs, often bringing out a water bowl. The atmosphere is casual and unpretentious. The courtyard is gravel, so be mindful of the heat on sunny days. It's a great local find for dog owners.
rules: Dogs must be on a leash. Do not allow your dog to roam freely. Owners are responsible for their pets' behavior.

name: Clinica Veterinaria Romana
shortDescription: A comprehensive veterinary clinic offering a full range of health services for pets.
fullDescription: Clinica Veterinaria Romana is a respected clinic known for its professional and compassionate care. They offer everything from routine check-ups and vaccinations to advanced surgical procedures. The clinic has a dedicated team of veterinarians and modern diagnostic equipment. They prioritize a calm environment to reduce stress for pets. Appointments are recommended, but they can accommodate emergencies. The staff are excellent at communicating and making sure you and your pet feel at ease.
rules: Dogs must be leashed at all times. Please bring your pet's vaccination records. Muzzles may be required for nervous dogs.

name: Belli Peli Grooming
shortDescription: A friendly and professional grooming salon for dogs, specializing in custom cuts and care.
fullDescription: Belli Peli Grooming provides high-quality grooming services in a calm and friendly environment. They offer baths, haircuts, nail trimming, and de-shedding treatments. The groomers are highly skilled and trained to handle all breeds and temperaments with patience and care. They use hypoallergenic and natural products. The salon is clean and well-organized, and appointments are required. It's a great place to get a stylish and comfortable cut for your dog.
rules: Appointments are mandatory. All dogs must have current vaccinations. Please inform staff of any health or behavioral issues.

name: Happy Dogs Daycare
shortDescription: A supervised doggy daycare with indoor and outdoor play areas for dogs to socialize.
fullDescription: Happy Dogs Daycare is a professional doggy daycare offering a safe and stimulating environment for dogs to play while their owners are away. The facility features a large indoor play area with rubber flooring and a small, secure outdoor space. All dogs are supervised by trained staff to ensure positive interactions. A preliminary temperament test is required to ensure the safety of all dogs. They offer flexible hours and different packages. It's a great way to provide your dog with exercise and socialization during the day.
rules: Dogs must be spayed or neutered after 6 months. All vaccinations must be current. A temperament evaluation is required.

name: Scuola del Cane
shortDescription: Offering professional dog training classes, from basic obedience to advanced behavior modification.
fullDescription: Scuola del Cane is a well-regarded training center that uses positive reinforcement techniques. They offer a variety of classes for all ages and skill levels, including puppy socialization, basic obedience, and city-specific training to handle urban environments. The trainers are certified and experienced. They also offer one-on-one sessions for specific behavioral issues. The classes are small to ensure personalized attention. It's a great place to build a strong bond with your dog and ensure they are well-behaved in all situations.
rules: Dogs must be up-to-date on vaccinations. You must register for classes in advance. Dogs with aggression issues may require a private consultation.
openingHours: Class schedules vary, check website for details

name: Hotel Amici a Quattro Zampe
shortDescription: A boutique hotel that provides a luxurious and comfortable stay for dogs and their owners.
fullDescription: Hotel Amici a Quattro Zampe is a pet-friendly boutique hotel in a central location. They welcome dogs of all sizes with a special welcome kit that includes a gourmet treat, a comfortable dog bed, and food/water bowls. Dogs are allowed in the rooms and the lobby, but not in the breakfast area. A small surcharge per night applies. The hotel is located close to several parks, making it easy to take your dog out for walks. The staff are exceptionally kind to pets and their owners.
rules: A pet surcharge applies. Dogs must be on a leash in public areas. Owners are responsible for any damages.

name: Fido's Supermercato
shortDescription: A comprehensive pet store offering everything your dog needs, from food to accessories.
fullDescription: Fido's Supermercato is a well-stocked pet store with a wide selection of products. They carry a variety of dog food brands, including natural and specialized diets. The store also features a large collection of toys, leashes, beds, and other supplies. The staff are knowledgeable and can help you find the right products for your dog. They often host adoption events and special promotions. The store is spacious and easy to walk through with a dog.
rules: Dogs must be on a leash. Please be respectful of other customers and their pets.

name: Parco del Pineto
shortDescription: A large urban park with a mix of trails and open spaces for hiking with your dog.
fullDescription: Parco del Pineto is a large, forested urban park that offers a great opportunity for hiking with your dog without leaving the city. The park has a network of unpaved trails that wind through pine trees and grassy areas. The terrain can be a bit hilly and uneven in some parts. It's a great spot for a moderate hike. While dogs are welcome, they must be on a leash. The park offers plenty of shade. Bring your own water as there are very few fountains.
rules: Dogs must be leashed at all times. Owners must clean up waste. Be mindful of other hikers and bikers.

name: L'Isola dei Cani
shortDescription: A professional grooming salon with a focus on a calming and stress-free experience.
fullDescription: L'Isola dei Cani offers a wide range of grooming services in a peaceful environment. The salon is known for its patience with nervous or anxious dogs, using a gentle approach. Services include bathing, trimming, nail clipping, and special treatments for skin conditions. They use high-quality, hypoallergenic products. Appointments are required. The staff are highly experienced and dedicated to providing a positive grooming experience.
rules: Appointments are mandatory. All dogs must have current vaccinations. Please inform staff of any health issues.

name: Doggy Town
shortDescription: A spacious and fun doggy daycare providing a safe and supervised environment for play.
fullDescription: Doggy Town is a large daycare facility that caters to dogs of all sizes and energy levels. They have a big indoor play area and a secure outdoor yard with artificial turf. All dogs are supervised by trained staff. The daycare requires a preliminary temperament test to ensure a safe and happy environment for all. They offer half-day and full-day options, and you can watch your dog play via live webcams. It's a great way to provide your dog with exercise and socialization.
rules: Dogs must be spayed or neutered. All vaccinations must be up-to-date. A temperament evaluation is required.

name: Il Gatto e il Cane
shortDescription: A small, boutique pet store with a focus on high-quality, organic products for dogs.
fullDescription: Il Gatto e il Cane is a charming boutique for dog and cat owners. They specialize in organic food, handmade treats, stylish leashes, and unique toys. The staff are extremely knowledgeable and can provide expert advice on nutrition and products. The store is designed to be a comfortable space for dogs to browse with their owners. They also host special events and workshops. It's a great place to find a unique and healthy gift for your pet.
rules: All dogs must be on a leash. Please be mindful of other customers and the limited space.

name: Roma Canine Club
shortDescription: A professional training center offering a variety of classes from puppy basics to advanced skills.
fullDescription: Roma Canine Club is a well-regarded training center that offers classes for all levels. They focus on positive reinforcement and provide small class sizes for individual attention. Their classes include Puppy Socialization, Basic Obedience, Agility, and specialized behavioral courses. The trainers are certified and experienced professionals. The facility has both an indoor and an outdoor fenced area for training. It's a great place to build a stronger bond with your dog and to improve their skills in a structured environment.
rules: All dogs must have proof of vaccinations. Enrollment is required prior to class. Please bring your dog's favorite treats.
openingHours: Class schedules vary, check website for details
amenities: ["Puppy Classes", "Basic Obedience", "Agility", "Private Sessions", "Indoor Facility", "Outdoor Fenced Area"]

name: Pizzeria La Zampa
shortDescription: A lively pizzeria with a large, dog-friendly terrace, known for its delicious pizza.
fullDescription: Pizzeria La Zampa is a popular spot for locals, offering classic Roman pizzas in a casual setting. The large outdoor terrace is perfect for dining with your dog. The staff are very welcoming and will provide a water bowl upon request. The atmosphere is bustling but relaxed, making it a great spot for a casual meal. The terrace is partially covered and offers some shade. It's especially popular on weekend evenings.
rules: Dogs must be on a leash and remain under the table. Please be mindful of other patrons and staff.

name: Amici a Quattro Zampe
shortDescription: A community group organizing regular dog walks and meetups in and around Rome.
fullDescription: Amici a Quattro Zampe is a community-driven group for dog owners who want to socialize their pets and meet new people. They organize free weekly meetups at different parks and dog-friendly locations around the city. The events are announced on their social media page. It's a casual and friendly atmosphere, welcoming all breeds and sizes. It's a great way to find new dog-friendly spots and build a community with other pet owners.
rules: Dogs must be friendly and well-socialized. Owners are responsible for their dogs at all times. Bring water and waste bags.
openingHours: Weekly, check social media for schedule
amenities: ["Community Group", "Social Events", "Dog Walks", "Play Dates", "Variety of Locations"]

name: Il Paradiso del Cane
shortDescription: A large, well-stocked pet store with a huge variety of products and services for dogs.
fullDescription: Il Paradiso del Cane is a comprehensive pet store where you can find everything you need for your dog under one roof. They have a vast selection of food, from major brands to specialty diets, as well as a huge array of toys, accessories, and grooming products. The store also offers a professional grooming service and a small self-service dog wash area. The staff are friendly and knowledgeable. The store is spacious and easy to navigate with a dog.
rules: Dogs must be on a leash. Please be mindful of other animals and customers in the store.
